s.text: By waiting until flies are young adults to activate gene overexpression, effects can be identified that are specific to adult aging.
The CG14975 ORF probe was generated using primers CG14975FWD (TCAGCCGAGAGATTCTAGAGAG) and CG14975REV (CATCGACCATTGTTCTCTCTCC).
The probe for exon 15 of the filamin A gene was generated using primers AMINAFWD (GCCAATGTAGGCCTTCTTCAG) and FILAMINAREV (ATCCATGCCATCCACGTCAAG).

DNA was transferred to a Southern blot and hybridized with a radiolabeled 172 bp fragment from the 3' P end of PdL . This probe fragment was generated by PCR amplification with primers located within the 3' P end, IRREV (ATGATGAAATAACATAAGGTGGTCCCG) and P3MCSREV (ATGAGTTAATTCAAACCCCACGGACAT).

DNA was transferred to a Southern blot and hybridized with a radiolabeled 172 bp fragment from the 3' P end of PdL . This probe fragment was generated by PCR amplification with primers located within the 3' P end, IRREV (ATGATGAAATAACATAAGGTGGTCCCG) and P3MCSREV (ATGAGTTAATTCAAACCCCACGGACAT).

DNA was transferred to a Southern blot and hybridized with a radiolabeled 172 bp fragment from the 3' P end of PdL . This probe fragment was generated by PCR amplification with primers located within the 3' P end, IRREV (ATGATGAAATAACATAAGGTGGTCCCG) and P3MCSREV (ATGAGTTAATTCAAACCCCACGGACAT).
RNA was isolated from adult Drosophila using the RNAqueous kit (Ambion), fractionated on 1.0% agarose gels and transferred to GeneScreen membranes (DuPont/NEN).
The enrichment step appears to have been at least partially successful, as the largest negative effect on life span observed among the 144 lines tested was -7.
The enrichment step appears to have been at least partially successful, as the largest negative effect on life span observed among the 144 lines tested was -7.
The enrichment step appears to have been at least partially successful, as the largest negative effect on life span observed among the 144 lines tested was -7.

However, all six lines were found to have PdL insertions at the 5' end of a gene and oriented in the sense direction, and in all six lines a transcript was overexpressed that was expected to contain a complete ORF.
The PdL insert in this line was located in the large first intron of the encore gene [ 35], with the promoter oriented in the sense direction (Figure 3a).
Aging is associated with characteristic changes at the physiological and molecular level, however organismal life span is still the best measure of aging rate.
Aging is associated with characteristic changes at the physiological and molecular level, however organismal life span is still the best measure of aging rate.
It is possible that overexpression of the putative transporter encoded by Sugar baby could increase life span by increasing uptake of a particular sugar and altering energy metabolism pathways.

Loss-of-function mutations of filamin disrupt the normal function of these actin cytoskeletal structures.

encore is also required for normal early mitotic division of the germline cells [ 44].
Experimental alterations of environment or genetic makeup that cause decreased life span might create novel diseases or pathologies that do not usually limit life span in a normal individual.
Loss-of-function mutations of filamin disrupt the normal function of these actin cytoskeletal structures.

In addition, lines in which PdL causes overexpression of a gene with large negative effects on life span should have been eliminated by this step.

Lines in which a gene was overexpressed that had a positive effect on life span should have been enriched in the final 144 lines, whereas ones with a significant negative effect should have been eliminated.

While there are a number of Drosophila genes encoding functional ORFs of this size, it is also possible that these transcripts do not encode a functional protein but rather function at the RNA level to affect life span.
